detail_desc: Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and kangaroo pockets. Unlined.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elastication at the top.
Knitted jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Soft, thermal fleece inside.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Loose-fitting top in an airy, patterned weave with fringing. Short, wide raglan sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and short slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and gently rounded hem.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Elasticated fabric hair scrunchies with a bow.

Fancy dress costume in jersey with padded shoulders and a padded chest, a bow tie at the front and a hook and loop fastening at the back. Fly with a hook and loop fastening, a detachable cape and a padded tail.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, text print on the front and a kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with glittery mesh frills over the shoulders. Press-studs at the back of the neck and crotch.
Wide waist belt in shiny, snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 6 cm.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a press-stud.
Rectangular clutch bag in grained imitation leather with a metal frame and clasp with a plastic bead at the top. Thin metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 5x9x18 cm.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-style vest top in soft jersey with a round neckline and visible seam down the back.

Peep-toed platform ankle boots with a cut-out section and an ankle strap with an adjustable metal buckle. Covered heels and platform, satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 1 cm, heel 11 cm.
Glasses chain in polished metal with silicone fasteners. Length 80 cm.
Knitted headband containing some mohair with a wrapover detail at the front.
Sleeveless A-line dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem with overlocked edges.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a layered, tiered skirt. Lined.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Hair elastics decorated with faux fur pompoms.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted side seams.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and loops at the top. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Ankle-length sports joggers in jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket, all with a concealed zip. Ventilating mesh section at the crotch. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Short shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and small frill trim at the hems.

Long-sleeved, checked shirt in lightweight cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted, sleeveless, polo-neck top in a ribbed knit with a slight sheen.

Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with a tab and button. Braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in a soft cotton blend with covered elastication at the waist, and side pockets.

Short dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck and butterfly sleeves. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, an elasticated seam under the bust with a detachable tie belt, and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves with smocked trims. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and flap with a concealed press-stud. Lined. Size 7x11x13 cm.
Bandeau bras in soft cotton jersey with side support and jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Flared skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with smocking at the waist.
Wide cardigan in a soft, textured knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hems, and press-stud fastenings.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, low crotch, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short legs. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.
Vest top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Flip-flops with plastic straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Blouse in woven fabric with concealed buttons down the front and a collar with detachable ties. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and frill-trimmed chest pocket.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and high cut at the back.
Thong briefs in soft lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Slippers in soft fabric with faux fur linings and insoles, and soles with anti-slip protectors.
Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes and braided ties that can be wound around the ankles. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Sandals in imitation leather with covered heels and narrow straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 7 cm.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Wide, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with a two-part chest pocket and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, a fake fly, front and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The dungaree shorts are made partly from recycled cotton.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Braided straw hat with a wide brim that is rolled up at the front. Width of brim 22 cm.
Lace balconette bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Polo shirt in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket, embroidered detail on the chest and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck front and back, short, flounced sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Strapless bikini top with removable inserts. No fasteners.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.

Chimi x H&M. A retro-inspired shirt that is perfect for both trips to the beach and rooftop parties in town. Straight-cut in an airy linen, viscose and cotton weave, this short-sleeved shirt has a resort collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back to create room for movement. It also has an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Available in two summery pastel shades.
